title: Pallet of 16" x 16" ARBE740 Non-slip Sand Texture Ceramic Tile (390 sqft)
item_description:
Pallet of 16" x 16" ARBE740 Non-slip Sand Texture Ceramic Tile (390 sqft)

Porcelain Tile Approximate: 16” × 16”
Approximate sqft: 390
Pallet Dimensions: 41” × 50” × 22”
Pallet Weight: 1150 lb
Surface: Non-slip Sand Texture
Seller States: Ceramic tile is rated for floor and wall applications. Pallets are wrapped and strapped for shipping.
